usage_rules.background: Always use #050505 (Void Black) as the main background.
usage_rules.text: Use pure white for headings, #a0a0b0 for secondary text.
usage_rules.cta: Use Neon Cyan (#00F0FF) or Neon Pink (#FF0099) for primary actions.
usage_rules.borders: Use subtle 1px borders with 10-20% opacity for structure.
usage_rules.glows: Use drop-shadows with the primary color to create a neon glow effect.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-filter: blur(16px); background: rgba(10, 10, 18, 0.6); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
visual_enhancers.grid_lines: background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 40px 40px;
visual_enhancers.scanlines: background: repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15), rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 2px); pointer-events: none;
visual_enhancers.borders: rounded-none or rounded-sm (sharp edges preferred for cyberpunk)

layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards. Gap-4 or Gap-6 between grid items.

animations.entrance: initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, transition: { duration: 0.5 }
animations.glow_pulse: animate: { boxShadow: ['0 0 10px rgba(0,240,255,0.5)', '0 0 20px rgba(0,240,255,0.8)', '0 0 10px rgba(0,240,255,0.5)'] }, transition: { duration: 2, repeat: Infinity }

buttons.primary: bg-[#00F0FF] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-[#00C0CC] hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_#00F0FF] transition-all duration-300 clip-path-polygon
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#FF0099] text-[#FF0099] hover:bg-[#FF0099]/10 hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_#FF0099] uppercase tracking-wider

cards.base: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 p-6 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.base: bg-black/50 border-white/10 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#00F0FF] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00F0FF] transition-all

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text has at least 4.5:1 contrast against the dark background.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible neon ring (#00F0FF) on focus for all interactive elements.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion media query for animations.

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and font families defined in 'design_system.colors' and 'design_system.typography'.
Add the Google Fonts link to 'public/index.html'.
implementation_rules: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard.
Apply 'glassmorphism' styles to all cards and containers.
Use 'Inter' font for all body text.
Implement the 'XP Progress Bar' with a neon fill animation.
Create a 'Level Up' overlay animation using framer-motion.
Ensure the 'AI Coach' chat interface looks like a futuristic terminal or messenger.
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications with a dark, neon-bordered style.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
